course_id.description: Course ID or "current" of the activity

on_date.description: Activities on a specific date. Accepts time format strings, eg. "Thursday, September 10, 2020 17:29:14", "2020-12-11" etc. Takes precedence over other date query arguments

from_date.description: Activities on and after a specific date. Accepts time format strings, eg. "Thursday, September 10, 2020 17:29:14", "2020-12-11" etc.

to_date.description: Activities to and on a specific date. Accepts time format strings, eg. "Thursday, September 10, 2020 17:29:14", "2020-12-11" etc.

activity_event.description: Whether to filter activities by "started" or "completed" date - values "started" and "completed"

activity_status.description: Whether to filter activities by status - values "open", "started" and "completed"

date_precision.description: When set to "full" takes into account hours,minutes and seconds when calculating date - values "full" and "day"

orderby.description: Order by  - values:  activity_id,	user_id,	post_id,	course_id,	activity_type,	activity_status,	activity_started,	activity_completed, 	activity_updated

activity_type.description: Activity type: course, lesson, topic, quiz

status.description: Status - One of: open, started, completed
